Name: Cyber Rider
About the game: Hello, when I saw that many people like the 'Cyber Driver' I developed, I thought why not let the speed come more intense? Let the speed become a storm? So this high-speed arcade racing game was born. I hope this game has only speed and passion, without any other elements to consider, which makes people relaxed, nervous and refreshing. Game Features super high-speed gaming experience. Simple game control, can be played with one hand. A variety of clothes colors and motorbike paint can be collected. Support 3 kinds of custom difficulty. Support Steam achievements. Support Steam leaderboard. Gameplay Avoid the cars on the road and accumulate points. Accumulate points and unlock more clothes colors and motorbike paint.
